titles.title: O come let us adore Him

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O come let us adore Him
O come let us adore Him
O come let us adore Him
Christ the Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For You alone are worthy
For You alone are worthy
For You alone are worthy
Christ the Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We'll give You all the glory
We'll give You all the glory
We'll give You all the glory

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I'll praise your name forever
I'll praise your name forever
I'll praise your name forever

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
We give you the glory
We give you the honor
We give you the praise!
